article.headline: Holy Cross 65, Siena 57
article.story: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) -- Torey Thomas scored 20 points and backcourt partner Keith Simmons added 18 points and 11 rebounds to lead Holy Cross to a 65-57 victory over Siena on Saturday. Alex Vander Baan's field goal with 2:42 left gave Holy Cross (3-0) the lead for good and Thomas added a 3-pointer moments later. Siena (0-2) trailed 44-31 with 16:50 left but Michael Haddix scored nine points to key a 13-2 run. Haddix led Siena with 13 points. David Ryan's 3-pointer gave Siena a 55-54 lead with 3:12 remaining. But Vander Baan's basket, off of a miss by Tim Clifford, gave the Crusaders a 56-55 lead. Thomas' 3-pointer gave Holy Cross a 59-55 lead with 1:35 to play. Holy Cross outrebounded the Saints 43-21 for the game, including 21-6 in offensive rebounds. Vander Baan had 10 rebounds. Kenny Hasbrouck and David Ryan scored 11 points apiece for Siena.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
